dashboards_data.name: Veeam Data Platform Monitoring
dashboards_data.description: Aggregated information about jobs run on Veeam Backup & Replication servers.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
_jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
    _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
_host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp 
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "2", 1)) as _failed
| fields _failed





| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _failed

actionData.xqlPhrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0)),
    _jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
        _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
    _jobTypeCode=if(
        _instanceId="290", "290", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "JobType\=\"(\d+)\""), 0)),
    _host=regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"),
    _description=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "Description\=\"([^\"]*)(?:\"|$)"),0)

        _jobTypeCode = "202","Restore Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "203","Undo Failover Plan",
        _jobTypeCode = "290","Restore Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "316","CDP Policy",
        _jobTypeCode = "4000","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12000","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12002","Agent Backup Job (Backup Policy)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12003","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",

        _jobTypeCode = "13003","File Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "14000","Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15000","Storage Snapshot Snapshot-Only Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15001","Storage Snapshot Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15002","Storage Snapshot Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15004","Storage Snapshot Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18000","Archive Tier Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18001","Archive Tier Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18002","Archive Download Session",

        _jobTypeCode = "18004","Archive Tier Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18005","Archive Tier Archiving Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18006","Publish Disk Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18008","Object Storage Repository Synchronization Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "24002","Guest OS File Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "33000","SureBackup Scan only",
        _jobTypeCode = "33001","SureBackup Scan only")
| fields

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("150","151")
| alter 
    _transferredGb=to_float(arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "TransferredGb\=\"(\d*\.?\d*)\""), 0)),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp sum(_transferredGb) as _totalTransferredGb
| replacenull _totalTransferredGb = 0
| fields _totalTransferredGb






| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _totalTransferredGb dataunit = "GB"

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","790","194","490","451")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0))
| alter 
_jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
    _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""),
    _instanceId in ("451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
_day=date_floor(_time ,"d"),
_host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp 
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "0", 1)) as Success, 
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "1", 1)) as Warning,
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "2", 1)) as Failed,  
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "3", 1)) as Working by _day
| fields Success, Warning, Failed, Working, _day
| sort asc _day



| view graph type = area subtype = standard show_percentage = `false` xaxis = _day yaxis = Success,Warning,Failed,Working seriescolor("Success","#00D15F") seriescolor("Working","#0084D1") seriescolor("Warning","#FF8F2E") seriescolor("Failed","#D10000")

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("40700")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0)),
    _jobResult=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "Result\:\ ([^.]*)"), 0),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| sort desc  _time
| fields
    _host as `Data Source`, _time as `Date`, _jobResult as `State`
| limit 100

dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
        _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| alter _jobResult=if(
    _jobResultCode = "0", "Success",
    _jobResultCode = "1", "Warning",
    _jobResultCode = "2", "Failed",
    _jobResultCode = "3", "Working")
| comp
    count(_instanceId) as _jobsByResult by _jobResult 




| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = _jobResult yaxis = _jobsByResult valuecolor("Success","#00D15F") valuecolor("Failed","#D10000")

dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0))
| alter 
    _jobTypeCode=if(
        _instanceId="290", "290", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "JobType\=\"(\d+)\""), 0)),
    _day=date_floor(_time ,"d"),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp 
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("1","50"), 1)) as _replicationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "3", 1)) as _sureBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("0","14000"), 1)) as _backupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "8", 1)) as _quickMigration,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "22", 1)) as _rescanJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "24", 1)) as _fileToTapeJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "28", 1)) as _backupToTapeJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "52", 1)) as _msSQLLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "54", 1)) as _oracleLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "60", 1)) as _HPEStoreOnceReplicationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("2","51","63","65","70"), 1)) as _backupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "74", 1)) as _postgreSQLLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "100", 1)) as _configurationBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "104", 1)) as _configurationDatabaseMaintenanceJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("202","290"), 1)) as _restoreJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "203", 1)) as _undoFailoverPlan,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "316", 1)) as _cdpPolicy,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("4000","12000","12003"), 1)) as _agentBackupJobBS,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "12002", 1)) as _agentBackupJobBP,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "13000", 1)) as _fileBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "13003", 1)) as _fileBackupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15000", 1)) as _storageSnapshotSnapshotOnlyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15001", 1)) as _storageSnapshotBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15002", 1)) as _storageSnapshotCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15004", 1)) as _storageSnapshotRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18000", 1)) as _archiveTierBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18001", 1)) as _archiveTierRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18002", 1)) as _archiveDownloadSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18003", 1)) as _archiveTierSynchronizationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18004", 1)) as _archiveTierBackupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18005", 1)) as _archiveTierArchivingJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18006", 1)) as _publishDiskSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18008", 1)) as _objectStorageRepositorySynchronizationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "24002", 1)) as _guestOSFileRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("33000", "33001"), 1)) as _sureBackupScanOnly
            by _day
| sort asc _day

input_dict.xql:

widgets_data.title: Failed Jobs

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)

| alter 
_jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
    _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),

| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp

| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _failed

widgets_data.title: Transferred Data
widgets_data.description: The total amount of transferred data.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("150","151")
| alter 
    _transferredGb=to_float(arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "TransferredGb\=\"(\d*\.?\d*)\""), 0)),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp sum(_transferredGb) as _totalTransferredGb
| replacenull _totalTransferredGb = 0
| fields _totalTransferredGb






| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _totalTransferredGb dataunit = "GB"

widgets_data.title: Backup and Copy Jobs: Daily Report
widgets_data.description: Daily statistics on finished backup and backup copy jobs.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","790","194","490","451")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0))
| alter 
_jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
    _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""),
    _instanceId in ("451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
    regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
_day=date_floor(_time ,"d"),
_host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp 
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "0", 1)) as Success, 
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "1", 1)) as Warning,
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "2", 1)) as Failed,  
    count(if(_jobResultCode = "3", 1)) as Working by _day
| fields Success, Warning, Failed, Working, _day
| sort asc _day



| view graph type = area subtype = standard show_percentage = `false` xaxis = _day yaxis = Success,Warning,Failed,Working seriescolor("Success","#00D15F") seriescolor("Working","#0084D1") seriescolor("Warning","#FF8F2E") seriescolor("Failed","#D10000")

        _jobTypeCode = "15002","Storage Snapshot Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15004","Storage Snapshot Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18000","Archive Tier Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18001","Archive Tier Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18002","Archive Download Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18003","Archive Tier Synchronization Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18004","Archive Tier Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18005","Archive Tier Archiving Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18006","Publish Disk Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18008","Object Storage Repository Synchronization Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "24002","Guest OS File Restore Session",

| limit 100

widgets_data.title: Finished Jobs by Type
widgets_data.description: Daily statistics on finished jobs by type.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0))
| alter 
    _jobTypeCode=if(
        _instanceId="290", "290", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "JobType\=\"(\d+)\""), 0)),
    _day=date_floor(_time ,"d"),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| comp 
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("1","50"), 1)) as _replicationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "3", 1)) as _sureBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("0","14000"), 1)) as _backupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "8", 1)) as _quickMigration,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "22", 1)) as _rescanJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "24", 1)) as _fileToTapeJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "28", 1)) as _backupToTapeJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "52", 1)) as _msSQLLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "54", 1)) as _oracleLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "60", 1)) as _HPEStoreOnceReplicationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("2","51","63","65","70"), 1)) as _backupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "74", 1)) as _postgreSQLLogBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "100", 1)) as _configurationBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "104", 1)) as _configurationDatabaseMaintenanceJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("202","290"), 1)) as _restoreJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "203", 1)) as _undoFailoverPlan,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "316", 1)) as _cdpPolicy,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("4000","12000","12003"), 1)) as _agentBackupJobBS,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "12002", 1)) as _agentBackupJobBP,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "13000", 1)) as _fileBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "13003", 1)) as _fileBackupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15000", 1)) as _storageSnapshotSnapshotOnlyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15001", 1)) as _storageSnapshotBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15002", 1)) as _storageSnapshotCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "15004", 1)) as _storageSnapshotRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18000", 1)) as _archiveTierBackupJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18001", 1)) as _archiveTierRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18002", 1)) as _archiveDownloadSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18003", 1)) as _archiveTierSynchronizationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18004", 1)) as _archiveTierBackupCopyJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18005", 1)) as _archiveTierArchivingJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18006", 1)) as _publishDiskSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "18008", 1)) as _objectStorageRepositorySynchronizationJob,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode = "24002", 1)) as _guestOSFileRestoreSession,
        count(if(_jobTypeCode in ("33000", "33001"), 1)) as _sureBackupScanOnly
            by _day
| sort asc _day




| view graph type = column subtype = stacked xaxis = _day yaxis =
